name: Traditional Sword
description: A historical Mongolian sword, often adorned with intricate designs on the hilt and scabbard.

name: Ger
description: A traditional Mongolian round tent made from felt and wood, used by nomadic herders.

name: Horse Head Fiddle (Morin Khuur)
description: A traditional Mongolian musical instrument resembling a horse's head, played with a bow.

name: Traditional Bow
description: A historical Mongolian bow, crafted from various materials and used for hunting and warfare.

name: Traditional Saddle
description: A historical Mongolian saddle designed for horseback riding, often with ornate decorations.

name: Traditional Stirrups
description: Historical Mongolian stirrups designed to provide stability for riders while mounted on horses.

name: Traditional Quiver
description: A historical Mongolian quiver used to hold arrows during hunting and warfare.

name: Traditional Horse Harness
description: Historical Mongolian horse harness used to control and guide horses during various tasks.
